original_text:
The fear of the Lord is pure,
    enduring forever.
The decrees of the Lord are firm,
    and all of them are righteous.
korean_text: 여호와를 경외하는 도는 정결하여 영원까지 이르고 여호와의 법도 진실하여 다 의로우니

sentences.original_text: The fear of the Lord is pure
The decrees of the Lord are firm
and all of them are righteous
